sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; import '../Css/ElectronicsFilter.css'; import All from '../Images/5110770.png'; import TV from '../Images/TV.png'; import Refrigerator from '../Images/refrigerator1.png'; import Ac from '../Images/AC.png'; import Washing from '../Images/Washing.png'; import Microwave from '../Images/Micro.png'; import Water from '../Images/Water.png'; const AppliancesFilter = ({ selectedSubCategory, selectedPrice, onSubCategoryChange, onPriceChange }) => { return(
onSubCategoryChange('')}>
All Appliance's
onSubCategoryChange('Refrigerators')}>
Refrigerator's
onSubCategoryChange('WashingMachines')}>
Washing Machine's
onSubCategoryChange('Televisions')}>
TV's
onSubCategoryChange('AirConditioners')}>
AC's
onSubCategoryChange('WaterPurifiers')}>
WaterPurifier's
onSubCategoryChange('MicrowaveOvens')}>
MicrowaveOven's
setMinPrice(e.target.value)} min={0} /> setMaxPrice(e.target.value)} max={200000} />
Clear filter
);}; export default AppliancesFilter;
